ValidationRule.description: If a value is entered into ANY of the three TCL related fields then it should be mandatory to enter values into the other TCL fields (ie. Values should be in all 3 fields or none of the three fields)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($User.Id !='00570000001tweu',AND( RecordType.Name == 'EMAP Fuel Accounts', NOT( AND( ISBLANK( Temporary_Credit_Limit__c ), ISPICKVAL( Temporary_Credit_Reason__c, '' ), ISBLANK( Temporary_Credit_Expire_Date__c ) )), OR( ISBLANK( Temporary_Credit_Limit__c ), ISPICKVAL( Temporary_Credit_Reason__c, '' ), ISBLANK( Temporary_Credit_Expire_Date__c ) ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter values into all the three Temporary Credit Limit related fields. (Temporary Credit Limit, Credit Reason and Credit Expiry date).
